name: Wavelength
description: Wavelength is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its sleek design and advanced technology, it is a true marvel to behold. Wavelength's cat-like box body, classic button interface, and foundry arms and legs make it a unique and versatile member of its robotic tribe. Its screen displays a mesmerizing game of snake, providing both entertainment and functionality. To top it off, Wavelength wears stylish glasses, adding a touch of sophistication to its appearance.
